name: group-7-project
description: ## How to run the habit tracker app 1. Clone this repository to your local machine. 2. Open the 'habit-tracker-app' folder. Run the following commands in the terminal: npm install, npm start. This will initialise the React app. 3. Open the 'backend' folder. Run the following commands in the terminal: npm install, npm start. This will initialise the local server. 4. User can now interact with the app.
